sentence.Network_en: A cream - coloured courser had used to visit this hill.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一个小山,从前有一个米色的考色鸟常来光顾.

sentence.Network_en: African courser that feeds on insect parasites on crocodiles.
sentence.Network_cn: 以寄生在鳄鱼身上昆虫为食的非洲走鸻.

sentence.Network_en: The little ugly duck murmured while walked, a courser scurried out.
sentence.Network_cn: 丑小鸭边走边说, 突然,一直猎狗窜了出来.

on portable bag that is formed by phoneticize and Chinese character , be like a courser to in run quickly " gold … "手提袋上那个由拼音和汉字构成的，似一匹骏马在奔驰的“金…

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French corsier, based on Latin cursus (see course)
mid 18th cent.: from modern Latin Cursorius 'adapted for running', from cursor 'runner', from the verb currere (see course)

means.word_mean: 1. swift-footed terrestrial plover-like bird of southern Asia and Africa

stems_affixes.value_cn: 粗糙的,粗劣的;粗鲁的,粗俗的
stems_affixes.word_buile: coar=cours跑,发生,快速做……+e快速做过去→粗糙的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 集合, 合流, 群众, 场所, 中央广场
stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+course[n.课程,教程;过程,进程;路程,路线;一道菜]→共同跑[的地方]
cours跑,发生,快速做……+er表名词→跑的人或动物
inter在……之间+cours跑,发生,快速做……+e→在二者之间跑→交流
re回+cours跑,发生,快速做……+e→跑回来→求助
